title: Google Pixel 3A review: a $399 phone with a great camera
description: Googles Pixel 3A or Pixel 3A XL is the best phone under $500, and its actually competitive with more expensive phones in one very important way. The Pixel 3A has a great camera. While it has many of the same compromises you usually make when you buy a cheap phone, the photos it takes are nearly indistinguishable from what comes out of a Pixel 3.
